Uses of Package
nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping

  • Packages that use nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping 
    Package Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.perdocument
    Classes for dealing with per-document resultsets (instead of per-hits resultsets, which BlackLab mostly deals with)
    nl.inl.blacklab.search
    Contains the main BlackLab classes.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping
    Classes for grouping hits.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping used by nl.inl.blacklab.perdocument 
    Class and Description
    HitPropValue
    A concrete value of a HitProperty of a Hit Implements Comparable<Object> as opposed to something more specific for performance reasons (preventing lots of runtime type checking during sorting of large results sets)
    HitPropValueDecade 
    HitPropValueInt 
    HitPropValueMultiple 
    HitPropValueString 
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping used by nl.inl.blacklab.search 
    Class and Description
    HitProperty
    Abstract base class for a property of a hit, like document title, hit text, right context, etc.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping used by nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping 
    Class and Description
    Group
    A group of results, with its group identity and the results themselves.
    GroupProperty
    Abstract base class for a property of a hit, like document title, hit text, right context, etc.
    Groups 
    GroupsAbstract
    A number of groups of hits, grouped on the basis of a list of criteria.
    HitProperty
    Abstract base class for a property of a hit, like document title, hit text, right context, etc.
    HitPropValue
    A concrete value of a HitProperty of a Hit Implements Comparable<Object> as opposed to something more specific for performance reasons (preventing lots of runtime type checking during sorting of large results sets)
    HitPropValueContext 
    HitPropValueContextWord 
    HitPropValueContextWords 
    HitPropValueDecade 
    HitPropValueInt 
    HitPropValueMultiple 
    HitPropValueString 
    RandomAccessGroup
    A group of results, with its group identity and the results themselves, that you can access randomly (i.e. you can obtain a list of Hit objects)
    RandomAccessGroups
    Groups results on the basis of a list of criteria.
